title: Profile Verification Pending
message: Your account or profile status is pending. You may be required to complete some verification before it can be approved.
htmlMessage: Your account or profile status is pending. You may be required to complete some verification before it can be approved
plainText: Your account or profile status is pending. You may be required to complete some verification before it can be approved

title: Profile Verification In Progress
message: Your account or profile verification is in progress. Processing can take 3 working days or more before getting a response. Thank you.
htmlMessage: Your account or profile verification is in progress. Processing can take 3 working days or more before getting a response. Thank you.
plainText: Your account or profile verification is in progress. Processing can take 3 working days or more before getting a response. Thank you.

title: Profile Verification Disapproved
message: Your account or profile verification has been disapproved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.
htmlMessage: Your account or profile verification has been disapproved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.
plainText: Your account or profile verification has been disapproved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.

title: Profile Verification Approved
message: Congratulations!!! Your account or profile verification has been approved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.
htmlMessage: Congratulations!!! Your account or profile verification has been approved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.
plainText: Congratulations!!! Your account or profile verification has been approved. Please kindly understand the reasons why it was disapproved and resubmit.
